scripts.dev:fns: npx wrangler pages dev public --do GLOBE_DO=GlobeDO@a MODEL_DO=ModelDO@b
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch client/src --ext "html,scss,js,mjs,ts,json" -x "npm run build:client-app && npx wrangler pages dev public --live-reload --do GLOBE_DO=GlobeDO@a"
scripts.build:client-app: rm -rf public && npx parcel build client/src/index.html --dist-dir ./public
scripts.publish:to-pages: yarn build:client-app && npx wrangler pages publish public
